title: Here's a curated reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that focus on data augmentation and semi-supervised learning, particularly in the context of limited text data
**"Back-Translation as Data Augmentation for Low Resource Speech-to-Text Translation"**
**"Unsupervised Data Augmentation for Consistency Training"** - Xie et al
Linguistically-Informed Interpolation of Hidden Space for Semi-Supervised Text Classification"** - Chen et al
**"Semi-Supervised Sequence Learning"** - Dai and Le
**"Virtual Adversarial Training: A Regularization Method for Supervised and Semi-Supervised Learning"** - Miyato et al
**"Consistency-based Semi-Supervised Learning for Object Detection"** - Sohn et al
**"Self-Training with Noisy Student improves ImageNet classification"** - Xie et al
**"Data Augmentation for Low-Resource Neural Machine Translation"** - Fadaee, Bisazza, and Monz
Easy Data Augmentation Techniques for Boosting Performance on Text Classification Tasks"** - Wei and Zou
**"MixMatch: A Holistic Approach to Semi-Supervised Learning"** - Berthelot et al
**"Semi-Supervised Learning with Deep Generative Models"** - Kingma et al
**"Noisy Student Training: An Efficient Semi-Supervised Learning Method"** - Xie et al
**"Augmenting Data with Mixup for Sentence Classification: An Empirical Study"** - Guo et al
**"Semi-Supervised Learning with Ladder Networks"** - Rasmus et al
**"A Survey of Data Augmentation Approaches for NLP"** - Feng et al
**"Data Augmentation for Text Classification using Text Generation"** - Kumar et al
**"Semi-Supervised Learning for Neural Machine Translation"** - He et al
**"Data Augmentation for Neural Machine Translation"**
**"Semi-Supervised Learning with Context-Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks"** - Dai et al
**"Data Augmentation for Low-Resource Neural Machine Translation Using Back-Translation"** - Poncelas et al

These articles cover a range of techniques and methodologies for enhancing text data through data augmentation and leveraging semi-supervised learning to improve model performance, especially in scenarios with limited labeled data
